file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: accountsPayable
  description: >-
    This is a generated connector for [WorkDay Accounts Payable REST API v1](https://community.workday.com/sites/default/files/file-hosting/restapi/index.html) OpenAPI specification.

    The WorkDay accounts payable service enables applications to access information related to accounts payable.
  x-ballerina-init-description: >
    The connector initialization requires setting the API credentials. 
 
    Follow [this guide] https://credentials.workday.com/docs/authentication/ and obtain tokens.
  x-ballerina-display:
    label: Workday Accounts Payable
    iconPath: icon.png 
  version: v1
tags:
  - name: supplierInvoiceRequests
paths:
  /supplierInvoiceRequests/{id}/submit:
    post:
      tags:
        - supplierInvoiceRequests
      summary: Submits a single supplier invoice instance.
      operationId: submitInvoiceInstance
      description: |-
        Submits a supplier invoice instance with the specified ID for approval.

        Secured by: Process: Supplier Invoice - Request

        Scope: Supplier Accounts
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/SubmitSupplierInvoiceRequest
        required: true
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Resource created.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/SubmitSupplierInvoiceRequest
        '400':
          description: >-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)


            You cannot submit this supplier invoice request due to Critical
            Custom Validations. Please fix the exceptions before submitting the
            supplier invoice request.


            You cannot submit this Supplier Invoice Request because the Supplier
            Invoice Request is not in submittable status.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
      x-codegen-request-body-name: submitSupplierInvoiceRequest
  /supplierInvoiceRequests/{id}/attachments/{subresourceID}?type=viewContent:
    get:
      tags:
        - supplierInvoiceRequests
      operationId: viewSupplierInvoiceRequests
      description: >-
        Secured by: View: Supplier Invoice Request, Process: Supplier Invoice -
        Request


        Scope: Supplier Accounts


        Contains attachment(s) only
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: subresourceID
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the subresource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
  /supplierInvoiceRequests:
    get:
      tags:
        - supplierInvoiceRequests
      summary: Retrieves a collection of supplier invoices.
      operationId: getSupplierInvoiceRequests
      description: >-
        Retrieves all supplier invoices.


        Secured by: View: Supplier Invoice Request, Self-Service: Supplier
        Invoice Request, Process: Supplier Invoice - Request


        Scope: Supplier Accounts
      parameters:
        - name: company
          in: query
          description: >-
            The company for the Common Financial Dimensions. This is for
            internal use only on a REST API.
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
        - name: fromDueDate
          in: query
          description: >-
            The  beginning date of the payment due period for this supplier
            invoice request. Use the MM/DD/YYYY format. Example: When the
            payment term is Net 30, the due date value is the day from this
            invoice date.
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: fromInvoiceDate
          in: query
          description: >-
            The date on or after which the supplier invoice is created using the
            MM/DD/YYYY format.
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: limit
          in: query
          description: >-
            The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is
            20. The maximum is 100.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - name: offset
          in: query
          description: >-
            The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection.
            The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control
            paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset
            is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with
            the 10th object.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - name: requester
          in: query
          description: The ID of the worker generating the supplier invoice request.
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
        - name: status
          in: query
          description: >-
            The status of the supplier invoice request. This is for internal use
            only on a REST API.
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
        - name: supplier
          in: query
          description: The supplier on the business documents.
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
        - name: toDueDate
          in: query
          description: >-
            The end date of the payment due period for this supplier invoice
            request. Use the MM/DD/YYYY format. Example: When the payment term
            is Net 30, the due date value is 30 days from the invoice date.
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: toInvoiceDate
          in: query
          description: >-
            The date on or before which the supplier invoice is created using
            the MM/DD/YYYY format.
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: >-
                        #/components/schemas/InvoiceRequestSummary
                  total:
                    type: integer
                    format: int64
                description: collection something or other
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
    post:
      tags:
        - supplierInvoiceRequests
      summary: Creates the supplier invoice as specified in the request.
      operationId: createSupplierInvoice
      description: |-
        Request Supplier Invoice Requests

        Secured by: Process: Supplier Invoice - Request

        Scope: Supplier Accounts
      parameters:
        - name: company
          in: query
          description: >-
            The company for the Common Financial Dimensions. This is for
            internal use only on a REST API.
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
        - name: fromDueDate
          in: query
          description: >-
            The  beginning date of the payment due period for this supplier
            invoice request. Use the MM/DD/YYYY format. Example: When the
            payment term is Net 30, the due date value is the day from this
            invoice date.
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: fromInvoiceDate
          in: query
          description: >-
            The date on or after which the supplier invoice is created using the
            MM/DD/YYYY format.
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: requester
          in: query
          description: The ID of the worker generating the supplier invoice request.
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
        - name: status
          in: query
          description: >-
            The status of the supplier invoice request. This is for internal use
            only on a REST API.
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
        - name: supplier
          in: query
          description: The supplier on the business documents.
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
        - name: toDueDate
          in: query
          description: >-
            The end date of the payment due period for this supplier invoice
            request. Use the MM/DD/YYYY format. Example: When the payment term
            is Net 30, the due date value is 30 days from the invoice date.
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: toInvoiceDate
          in: query
          description: >-
            The date on or before which the supplier invoice is created using
            the MM/DD/YYYY format.
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/CreateInvoiceRequestSummary
        required: true
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Resource created.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/CreateInvoiceRequestSummary
        '400':
          description: >-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)


            Enter a requester that has a status of Active or a Hiring Date
            before today. You can't enter a requester that has a status of
            Terminated or a Hiring Date in the future.


            Values for Quantity and Unit Cost are not allowed for Invoice
            Request Service Lines.


            [list of worktag types] not valid for this transaction.


            The following worktag type(s) are required: [missing types]


            Total of Extended Amount in Invoice Request line splits are not same
            as Extended Amount for Invoice Request Line


            All purchase items must be active.


            Supplier Connection is not valid for Supplier.


            Enter an Item or Item Description on the Supplier Invoice Request
            Service Line.


            The Extended Amount of the splits must equal Quantity of the splits
            multiplied by Unit Cost of the line. Currently,[expression].


            Worktags are not allowed when there are split lines.


            Enter a whole number for Quantity if you want to split by quantity.


            The quantity must be a whole number.


            Currency entered is not listed as an Accepted Currency by Supplier.


            Supplier Connection is Inactive.


            Total of Quantity in Invoice Request line splits are not same as
            Quantity for Invoice Request Goods Line


            The following Accounting Worktags are required but have not been
            assigned: [missing].


            The [type] is/are not available for use with the company/s:
            [partitionable] [company]


            Can not have any combination of Project, Project Phase or Project
            Task worktags for the same line.


            Enter at least one invoice request line.


            Service Lines cannot be split based on quantity.


            The Supplier's Invoice Number entered has already been used on
            another Supplier Invoice, Adjustment, or Invoice Request for this
            supplier


            Only one worktag for each type is allowed for each document line.


            [invalid supplier invoice worktag value message]


            [missing required worktag types on Spend Transactions]


            The Quantity must equal zero when you split a supplier invoice
            request line by amount.


            The following worktag type(s) are invalid: [invalid type]


            The Supplier Invoice Request Line cannot be marked as Billable if
            the selected Worktag is not for a Project Plan, Phase, or Task from
            a Billable Project.


            The total invoice request amount does not match the control total
            amount.


            Reference Number is missing.  The Reference Number is required when
            submitting an invoice request with a Reference Type.


            The Invoice Type must be active, have supplier accounts usage, and
            apply to the same country as the company on this document.


            Currency Conversion Rates between currency and company's default
            currency are not defined.


            [worktag value] is not permitted as an allowed value for worktag
            type: [worktag type], because it is inactive.


            Select a unit of measure that is already in use for the supplier
            item.


            Reference Type is missing. The Reference Type is required when
            submitting an invoice request with a Reference Number.


            Select a balancing worktag for Worktags of the following type:
            [type]


            The Extended Amount of the lines must equal Quantity of the lines
            multiplied by Unit Cost of the line. Currently,[expression].


            Spend Category must match the Spend Category for the Purchase Item.


            Quantity is required for a Purchase Item.


            Currency is required.


            Suppliers that are restricted to company must be restricted to
            either the document header company or the Company Hierarchy for
            which it is a subordinate.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
      x-codegen-request-body-name: createInvoiceRequestSummary
  /supplierInvoiceRequests/{id}/attachments/{subresourceID}:
    get:
      tags:
        - supplierInvoiceRequests
      summary: Retrieves a single attachment instance.
      operationId: getSupplierInvoiceRequestAttachment
      description: >-
        Retrieves an attachment with the specified subresource ID for the
        specified supplier invoice.


        Secured by: View: Supplier Invoice Request, Process: Supplier Invoice -
        Request


        Scope: Supplier Accounts
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: subresourceID
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the subresource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/AttachmentSummary
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
  /supplierInvoiceRequests/{id}/attachmentst:
    get:
      tags:
        - supplierInvoiceRequests
      operationId: getInvoiceRequestAttachmentByID
      description: >-
        Secured by: View: Supplier Invoice Request, Process: Supplier Invoice -
        Request


        Scope: Supplier Accounts


        Contains attachment(s) only
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: limit
          in: query
          description: >-
            The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is
            20. The maximum is 100.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - name: offset
          in: query
          description: >-
            The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection.
            The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control
            paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset
            is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with
            the 10th object.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
  /supplierInvoiceRequests/{id}/lines:
    get:
      tags:
        - supplierInvoiceRequests
      summary: Retrieves a collection of supplier invoice lines.
      operationId: getSupplierInvoiceLines
      description: >-
        Retrieves all supplier invoice lines for the specified supplier invoice.


        Secured by: View: Supplier Invoice Request, Process: Supplier Invoice -
        Request


        Scope: Supplier Accounts
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: limit
          in: query
          description: >-
            The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is
            20. The maximum is 100.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - name: offset
          in: query
          description: >-
            The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection.
            The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control
            paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset
            is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with
            the 10th object.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: >-
                        #/components/schemas/ViewLineSummary
                  total:
                    type: integer
                    format: int64
                description: collection something or other
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
  /supplierInvoiceRequests/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - supplierInvoiceRequests
      summary: Retrieves a single supplier invoice instance.
      operationId: getSupplierInvoiceInstance
      description: >-
        Retrieves the supplier invoice with the specified ID.


        Secured by: View: Supplier Invoice Request, Self-Service: Supplier
        Invoice Request, Process: Supplier Invoice - Request


        Scope: Supplier Accounts
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/InvoiceRequestSummary
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.

  /supplierInvoiceRequests/{id}/attachments:
    get:
      tags:
        - supplierInvoiceRequests
      summary: >-
        Retrieves a collection of attachments for the specified supplier
        invoice.
      operationId: getInvoiceAttachments
      description: >-
        Retrieves all attachments associated with supplier invoices.


        Secured by: View: Supplier Invoice Request, Process: Supplier Invoice -
        Request


        Scope: Supplier Accounts
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: limit
          in: query
          description: >-
            The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is
            20. The maximum is 100.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - name: offset
          in: query
          description: >-
            The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection.
            The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control
            paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset
            is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with
            the 10th object.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: >-
                        #/components/schemas/AttachmentSummary
                  total:
                    type: integer
                    format: int64
                description: collection something or other
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
    post:
      tags:
        - supplierInvoiceRequests
      summary: Creates a new attachment for the supplier invoice.
      operationId: createsNewAttachmentSupplierInvoice
      description: |-
        Creates attachments for the specified supplier invoice.

        Secured by: Process: Supplier Invoice - Request

        Scope: Supplier Accounts

        Contains attachment(s)
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/CreateAttachmentSummary
        required: true
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Resource created.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/CreateAttachmentSummary
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
      x-codegen-request-body-name: createAttachmentSummary
  /supplierInvoiceRequests/{id}/lines/{subresourceID}:
    get:
      tags:

components:
  schemas:
    INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE:
      required:
        - id
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          pattern: ^(?:(?:[0-9a-f]{32})|(?:[0-9]+\$[0-9]+)|(\S+=\S+))$
          type: string
          description: wid / id / reference id
        descriptor:
          type: string
          description: A description of the instance
          readOnly: true
        href:
          type: string
          description: A link to the instance
          readOnly: true
    ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE:
      required:
        - error
      type: object
      properties:
        error:
          type: string
          description: A description of the error
    VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        - type: object
          properties:
            errors:
              type: array
              description: An array of validation errors
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
    FACETS_MODEL_REFERENCE:
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        properties:
          descriptor:
            type: string
            description: A description of the facet
          facetParameter:
            type: string
            description: The alias used to select the facet
          values:
            type: array
            description: the facet values
            items:
              required:
                - id
              type: object
              properties:
                count:
                  type: integer
                  description: The number of instances returned by this facet
                  format: int32
                id:
                  pattern: ^(?:(?:[0-9a-f]{32})|(?:[0-9]+\$[0-9]+)|(\S+=\S+))$
                  type: string
                  description: wid / id / reference id
                descriptor:
                  type: string
                  description: A description of the facet
                href:
                  type: string
                  description: A link to the instance
                  readOnly: true
        description: This object represents the possible facets for this resource
        readOnly: true
    MULTIPLE_INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE:
      type: object
      properties:
        total:
          type: integer
        data:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE'
    StatutoryInvoiceType:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        - type: object
    HandlingCode:

        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE'

        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        - type: object

        - type: object
    PaymentTerms:

    ShipToAddress:

        - type: object

        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        - type: object
    Requester:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE'

    Supplier:

              $ref: >-
